item.description:
Please join me at Les Zygomates for an evening of wine tasting. The wines will be New Zealand Pinot Noir. The cost is $30.

I'm also the assistant organizer for the Boston Wine Meetup, so this event is on their calendar as well; therefore, not everyone at this tasting will be divorced.

I know most of you probably live and work in the 'burbs, but this restaurant is within walking distance from South Station, so maybe you could hop on a train for this event.

I plan to get there between 6:30pm to 6:45pm, so feel free to call me before the wine tasting starts. I may need to turn off my phone once it starts because they often have a speaker there discussing the wine, so I don't want to be rude by distracting the speaker and the people around me if my phone rings.

Check out the Les Zygomates' website to reserve your spot and to get more info:

http://www.winebar.co...

Consider taking public transportation and here's the link for that:

http://www.mbta.com/...

Also, Les Zygomates often has a jazz band playing, so I may stay after the tasting to listen to the band.

Please call the restaurant first to reserve your spot, then reply yes on the calendar.

Cheers!

Lisa
item.how_to_find_us: My cell phone # is 617-999-9094. It should be pretty easy to find me. I look like my picture ... Well, okay, maybe I'm 20lbs heavier and my hair is a bit lighter, so picture that and you'll find me.

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Wine Tasting
